title: Friend's account got hacked, moved ang changed password and summonername.
body:
Hello Riot, 

My friend's account got hacked, moved and renamed also the password is changed. He also got an email from riot support where the Hacker explains a problem ( he dont know the language) and the riot support even replied on hackers ticket. He cant login on the HP or the game, how can he procced to get his account back?

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help your friend out.  Have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) with an email address he has access to.  Our account team can help restore access and update his info.  Thanks for looking out for him!
